Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a higher law than the law of government. That's the law of conscience

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if you don't like me, you know me because I'm just in your face

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: People who think dying is the worst thing don't know a thing about life

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all given some sort of skill in life. Mine just happens to be beating up on people

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a minister, I'm not a philosopher, I'm not a politician, I'm in another category

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: She who succeeds in gaining the mastery of the bicycle will gain the mastery of life

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: If you cut down a forest, it doesn't matter how many sawmills you have if there are no more trees

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are grateful - when you can see what you have - you unlock blessings to flow in your life

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm disappearing, avoiding most things

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe any success in life is made by going into an area with a blind, furious optimism

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: No water, no life. No blue, no green

Quote.Author: T. Boone Pickens
Quote.QuoteValue: I say, you work eight hours, and you sleep eight hours - be sure they're not the same eight hours

Quote.Author: T. C. Boyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is tragic and absurd, and none of it has any purpose at all

Quote.Author: T. J. Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: There's sketch, improv, writing, acting, music, and badminton. Those are the seven forms of comedy

Quote.Author: T.I.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to always rise above the doubt that may exist about me

Quote.Author: T
Quote.QuoteValue: ehisi Coates - I do understand how hate eats at the soul and how to purge yourself of hate

Quote.Author: Tacitus
Quote.QuoteValue: When men are full of envy they disparage everything, whether it be good or bad

Quote.Author: Tadao Ando
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a role and function for beauty in our time

Quote.Author: Taj Mahal
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't want to fall into the trap of complacency

Quote.Author: Talib Kweli
Quote.QuoteValue: Skip the religion and politics, head straight to the compassion. Everything else is a distraction

Quote.Author: Tallulah Bankhead
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner

Quote.Author: Tamara Ecclestone
Quote.QuoteValue: As a woman, I believe you have to embrace your body, and feel beautiful both inside and out

Quote.Author: Tamara Tunie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm Irish on St. Patrick's Day. I'm Italian on Columbus Day. I'm a New Yorker every day

Quote.Author: Tammy Duckworth
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent a lot of time between bars like this

Quote.Author: Taraji P. Henson
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, I stand by who I am. I'm a good person

Quote.Author: Tariq Ramadan
Quote.QuoteValue: Times have changed; so must the lenses through which we see the political future

Quote.Author: Tatiana Maslany
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust your gut. You know yourself, so don't let somebody else tell you who you are

Quote.Author: Tavi Gevinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater

Quote.Author: Taya Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned that when God promises beauty through the ashes, He means it

Quote.Author: Taylor Lautner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the biggest motorcycle fan - they're cool and a lot of fun, but they're scary as well!

Quote.Author: Taylor Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: Be yourself. You're okay. And it really doesn't matter what other people think

Quote.Author: Ted Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: My touchstone for every question is the Constitution

Quote.Author: Ted Nugent
Quote.QuoteValue: Vegetarians are cool. All I eat are vegetarians - except for the occasional mountain lion steak

Quote.Author: Ted Sarandos
Quote.QuoteValue: The typical output deal from a studio is 10 to 14 movies a year

Quote.Author: Ted Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't think too good, don't think too much

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more apt to cry at something beautiful than at something sad

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot emphasize enough the importance of a good teacher

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing worse than a liar is a liar that's also a hypocrite!

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: They are so knowing, that they know nothing

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Evil is often supposed to be without rhyme or reason

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody really knows what they look like. The mirror shows you only what you want to see

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Since I was little, I've had that vision of a businesswoman inside me

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: I hold grudges, but I can't hate nobody; that's not my nature

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: I make good music for long journeys

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom would be not to choose between black and white but to abjure such prescribed choices

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: Shopping at any level is a bit of therapy for my medulla oblongata

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: In tough times, everyone has to take their share of the pain

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: The huge problem in our society is the enormous ignorance of the ideas that underlie modern art

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Intensity' is a good word. It's like ambition, if it's not ambition at expense of someone else

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the nicest thing to do with a guitar is just look at it

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing except the mint can make money without advertising

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no substitute for face-to-face reporting and research

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have one true friend you have more than your share

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I work in show business - there's nothing that shocks me anymore!

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are the money of fools

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: The great thing in the world is not so much to seek happiness as to earn peace and self-respect

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: The great accomplishments of man have resulted from the transmission of ideas and enthusiasm

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: We go through our careers and things happen to us. Those experiences made me what I am

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is forever

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: People's behavior makes sense if you think about it in terms of their goals, needs, and motives

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart that has truly loved never forgets, But as truly loves on to the close

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easier to run for office than to run the office

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not just trying to be good at one thing and then call it a day. I want to be like Bruno Mars

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: Choose your friends with caution; plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: Boredom is the feeling that everything is a waste of time; serenity, that nothing is

Quote.Author: Tia Mowry
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nobody in the world that knows me better than my sister

Quote.Author: Tiger Shroff
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not at all stylish. For me, style is a state of mind and individuality

Quote.Author: Tiger Woods
Quote.QuoteValue: Achievements on the golf course are not what matters, decency and honesty are what matter

Quote.Author: Tila Tequila
Quote.QuoteValue: My fans and people who know of my character want to see me become more successful

Quote.Author: Tim Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a creative guy, artistically with graphics

Quote.Author: Tim Berner
Quote.QuoteValue: ee - We need diversity of thought in the world to face the new challenges

Quote.Author: Tim Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: Visions are worth fighting for. Why spend your life making someone else's dreams?

Quote.Author: Tim Cook
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is fragile. We're not guaranteed a tomorrow so give it everything you've got

Quote.Author: Tim Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember candy rationing until I was, like, 7

Quote.Author: Tim Gunn
Quote.QuoteValue: Does a man need to know what a peplum is? Probably not

Quote.Author: Tim Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end, very little gets in the way of what Manchester United wants to do

Quote.Author: Tim O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter does not deny pain. Laughter - like a wail - acknowledges and replies to pain

Quote.Author: Tim Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're a quarterback and you keep throwing interceptions, you change quarterbacks

Quote.Author: Tim Tebow
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always use the negativity as more motivation to work even harder and become even stronger

Quote.Author: Tim Vine
Quote.QuoteValue: I went out on a date with Simile. I don't know what I metaphor

Quote.Author: Timothy Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: You can always pick up your needle and move to another groove

Quote.Author: Timothy Noah
Quote.QuoteValue: The U.S. policy of hoarding crude oil never made the world, or even the U.S., a safer place

Quote.Author: Tina Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The Taliban knows they have more to fear from an educated girl than an American drone

Quote.Author: Tina Fey
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a mom has made me so tired. And so happy

Quote.Author: Tink
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to artistry is being able to say stuff the way other people can't

Quote.Author: Tippi Hedren
Quote.QuoteValue: Birds I am fine with - spiders are an entirely different matter

Quote.Author: Tituss Burgess
Quote.QuoteValue: I hover closer to earth than I do the clouds

Quote.Author: Todd Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Bangkok, like Las Vegas, sounds like a place where you make bad decisions

Quote.Author: Todd Rundgren
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought a Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in Cleveland or anywhere else was a good idea

Quote.Author: Tom Araya
Quote.QuoteValue: When I do interviews, I enter them with an open mind and try to answer the questions the best I can

Quote.Author: Tom Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't interested in novelty. I was looking for good drama

Quote.Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference

Quote.Author: Tom Clancy
Quote.QuoteValue: The objective of a terrorist is to create political change in the society he targets

Quote.Author: Tom Cotton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do stairs. And I don't do groups

Quote.Author: Tom Cruise
Quote.QuoteValue: I disagree with people who think you learn more from getting beat up than you do from winning

Quote.Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to do different things. I'm always obsessed with trying to do different things

Quote.Author: Tom Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Sweet, delicious Dungeness crab is always a treat

Quote.Author: Tom Felton
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to fish. Fishing is always a way of relaxing

Quote.Author: Tom Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I probably do have an obsessive personality, but striving for perfection has served me well

Quote.Author: Tom Hanks
Quote.QuoteValue: A hero is somebody who voluntarily walks into the unknown

Quote.Author: Tom Hodgkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: When the going gets tough, the tough take a nap

Quote.Author: Tom Landry
Quote.QuoteValue: A winner never stops trying

Quote.Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote.QuoteValue: Be prepared, and be careful not to do your good deeds when there's no one watching you

Quote.Author: Tom Peters
Quote.QuoteValue: If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade

Quote.Author: Tom Rath
Quote.QuoteValue: Making better choices takes work. There is a daily give and take, but it is worth the effort

Quote.Author: Tom Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: We're our own dragons as well as our own heroes, and we have to rescue ourselves from ourselves

Quote.Author: Tom Selleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I live a pretty simple life

Quote.Author: Tom Shadyac
Quote.QuoteValue: I think true success is intrinsic... It's love. It's kindness. It's community

Quote.Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote.QuoteValue: If you carry your childhood with you, you never become older

Quote.Author: Tom Waits
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't you know there ain't no devil, it's just god when he's drunk

Quote.Author: Tom Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose

Quote.Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote.QuoteValue: The surest cure for vanity is loneliness

Quote.Author: Tommy Chong
Quote.QuoteValue: But you can't exercise and be high. It's impossible

Quote.Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's dangerous to think that you're successful, because then you become complacent

Quote.Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really a cool, mellow guy. I'm not as crazy as everybody thinks

Quote.Author: Tommy Lee Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The world's not a very comfortable place if you have a nightmare to face

Quote.Author: Tommy Wiseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I inspire myself

Quote.Author: Toni Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: All water has a perfect memory and is forever trying to get back to where it was

Quote.Author: Tony Abbott
Quote.QuoteValue: I would not want to see any relaxation of the law prohibiting human cloning

Quote.Author: Tony Blair
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing

Quote.Author: Tony Campolo
Quote.QuoteValue: Of the 22 industrialized nations of the world, we're dead last in per capita giving to poor people

Quote.Author: Tony Dungy
Quote.QuoteValue: The best leaders are following Christ. That's the best leader you can follow

Quote.Author: Tony Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a short attention span

Quote.Author: Tori Amos
Quote.QuoteValue: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light

Quote.Author: Tory Burch
Quote.QuoteValue: I never go out during the day without sunglasses

Quote.Author: Tory Lanez
Quote.QuoteValue: The way that I learned to be confident was I would ride the back of the city bus and sing very low

Quote.Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a connoisseur of products. I check out everything, I try everything

Quote.Author: Tracey Emin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ask for an apology because it's only tomorrow's fish-and-chip paper

Quote.Author: Tracy Morgan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the word 'pregnant' is funny

Quote.Author: Travis Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living

Quote.Author: Travis Kalanick
Quote.QuoteValue: Ultimately, progress and innovation win

Quote.Author: Travis Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot of us out here that are birds, man. We all need to just fly

Quote.Author: Trent Reznor
Quote.QuoteValue: In my nothing, you were everything, to me

Quote.Author: Trey Anastasio
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved the experience of working together with other people toward an artistic goal

Quote.Author: Trey Gowdy
Quote.QuoteValue: You may be less likely to pick on someone if you don't know what's in their briefcase or purse

Quote.Author: Trey Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem is we moved to LA... The only way to be punk rock in L.A. is to be a Republican

Quote.Author: Trisha Yearwood
Quote.QuoteValue: What's meant to be will always find a way

Quote.Author: Troy Polamalu
Quote.QuoteValue: When I let my hair down, I just let it down. It's more comfortable in my helmet

Quote.Author: Truman Capote
Quote.QuoteValue: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go

Quote.Author: Tucker Carlson
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a feminist, you could cut your hair really short. You have to be really angry about something

Quote.Author: Tucker Max
Quote.QuoteValue: The haters always scream the loudest

Quote.Author: Twiggy
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion should be stylish and fun

Quote.Author: Twinkle Khanna
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, a life that doesn't change things and touch people's lives is pretty meaningless

Quote.Author: Twyla Tharp
Quote.QuoteValue: Dance is the most fundamental of all art forms

Quote.Author: Ty Dolla Sign
Quote.QuoteValue: If something's dope, you got to go with it

Quote.Author: Tyga
Quote.QuoteValue: The best career advice I've gotten is to stay focused, keep moving forward

Quote.Author: Tyler Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to give. I've been a giver all my life

Quote.Author: Tyra Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the confidence that makeup gives me

Quote.Author: Uday Kotak
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a believer in the journey and enjoying the journey

Quote.Author: Ulysses S. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: My failures have been errors in judgment, not of intent

Quote.Author: Uma Thurman
Quote.QuoteValue: Tall, sandy blonde, with sort of blue eyes, skinny in places, fat in others. An average gal

Quote.Author: Umberto Eco
Quote.QuoteValue: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else

Quote.Author: Unknown
Quote.QuoteValue: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power

Quote.Author: Ursula Andress
Quote.QuoteValue: This bikini made me a success

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: To light a candle is to cast a shadow

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of legends, a lot of people, have come before me. But this is my time

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a flamboyant type of guy, a cooler version of Liberace

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't go to England because they won't let my dog in

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not like a gorgeous bombshell or anything like that

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: Interview with a Vampire was lots of sex, so I'm not sure

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: It is important not to trust people too much

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Without deadlines and restrictions I just tend to become preoccupied with other things

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is very sexy

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: There are just so many funny kids and teenagers. They're just not aware of how funny they are

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: Being cool is being your own self, not doing something that someone else is telling you to do

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: I will be the Thai equivalent of Eddie the Eagle

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like the ocean, it goes up and down

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have any reason to hate anybody; I believe in good karma and spreading good energy

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day, I wake up and say, 'Good Morning, Jesus.'

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm part wood nymph. I require mountains and warm, dense patches of moss to thrive

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing stunt work is risky, but it's something I enjoy

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Instead of building walls, we should be building bridges

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: That's my opportunity to hide behind that old lady and say what I want to say

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had the same barber since I was about 14 years old

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: Being on a television series is sort of life-altering on every level

Quote.Author: Victor LaValle
Quote.QuoteValue: Lonely women destroy themselves; lonely men threaten the world

Quote.Author: Victor Ponta
Quote.QuoteValue: Romania strongly supports Turkey's E.U. accession

Quote.Author: Victoria Abril
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your ears open, your eyes open, grab everything you can, react, and learn!

Quote.Author: Victoria Azarenka
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandmother is the person who inspires me the most

Quote.Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always loved fashion since I was a kid and customized my school uniforms

Quote.Author: Victoria Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I always dreamed of being Maria in The Sound of Music

Quote.Author: Victoria Justice
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to just embrace the natural beauty within you

Quote.Author: Victoria Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not perfect, but what's wonderful about eating a plant-based diet is, I don't have to be

Quote.Author: Victoria Pendleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I worried I was a boyish shape. I always thought I might grow some, but it never happened

Quote.Author: Victoria Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I came to acting in a very circuitous way

Quote.Author: Victoria Principal
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to a woman for advice about how to be in business, but I learned a great deal from men

Quote.Author: Victoria Woodhull
Quote.QuoteValue: While others prayed for the good time coming, I worked for it

Quote.Author: Vidal Sassoon
Quote.QuoteValue: It's okay saying sorry, but when you are drunk you say what you really feel

Quote.Author: Vidya Balan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a woman should be wholesome, voluptuous and sizzling!

Quote.Author: Viggo Mortensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like stories that leave you wanting more, leave you wondering, but don't tell you everything

Quote.Author: Vijay Mallya
Quote.QuoteValue: I live the way I want to live, and I don't comment on the way that other people live

Quote.Author: Vikas Swarup
Quote.QuoteValue: The slums are not a place of despair. Its inhabitants are all working towards a better life

Quote.Author: Vikram Seth
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about inspiration is that it takes your mind off everything else

Quote.Author: Viktor Orban
Quote.QuoteValue: The best migrant is the migrant who does not come

Quote.Author: Ville Valo
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is always criticized and always an outsider gets the blame

Quote.Author: Vince Flynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a Libertarian

Quote.Author: Vince McMahon
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest thrill in the world is entertaining the public, there is no bigger thrill than that

Quote.Author: Vince Staples
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was growing up, skateboarding was big and basketball was big

Quote.Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever you're scared of something, don't let that define you. We all feel it, but step up

Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: This is America, not a banana republic

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: The minute I started being recognised, I became much more discreet

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: And I have been able to establish this sort of decent reputation as being a decent character actor

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Color can do anything that black-and-white can

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you do a stunt, the more you increase the risk of something happening

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had my ear pierced with a diamond stud. I did it myself when I was 16

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody wants to be a lawyer - it's hard work. But it was kind of my academic route

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: Although I've had several major career changes, I was extremely hesitant about making some of them

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us who serve in the House of Representatives and the Senate pay into Social Security

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: Storage problems make neon signs the most ephemeral of commercial arts

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep vengeance is the daughter of deep silence

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: What drives success, and the most successful students, is internal motivation

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't think without my glasses

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: My future is in my past and my past is my present. I must now make the present my future

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: A mother-in-law is better than a single and childless political persona, though

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a hard-core cult following of at least 12

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: My job is to inspire the people, to be on top of my game and push my culture forward

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I spend most of my time thinking about things like laundry and buying stationery supplies

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to make snap judgments. I never, ever make conclusions about products I've never tried

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Never buy four C-plus paintings when you can buy one A

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest mistake is trying to be more agreeable than you can be

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: Counsel woven into the fabric of real life is wisdom

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't imagine a person becoming a success who doesn't give this game of life everything he's got

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: I like people who take responsibility for their lives

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: How long it takes to write a book depends on its length

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Time was God's first creation

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: When men can no longer be theists, they must, if they are civilized, become humanists

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Hacking involves a different way of looking at problems that no one's thought of

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: Men, like nails, lose their usefulness when they lose their direction and begin to bend

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out
